title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, paper, bobbin net
Technique: embroidered and appliquéd on cut supplementary warp pile (velvet); in paper envelope
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Black velvet embroidered in border design with flower sprays and narrow bobbin lace applied.
